item.title: My Account [Got Hacked Today] [Main]
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Taharok:

Okay, what about the 97 hitpoints? How many accounts do you know are unbanned, have a great amount of wealth, have 97 hitpoints, 33 summoning and 70 prayer?

Maybe about 3-8 accs lol.

bootnecklad:

Do you really want to check the high scores?

YEAH!!!

Read full topic

Its not meant to be ‘proper’ in anyway…

anyway back on topic!

so you got hacked, who cares? votes

Quit trying to shit stir… stay on topic douche
[/quote]
Did i ask you anything? No? then why don’t you shut the fuck up and mind your own business.[/quote]
Firstly, Learn how to quote… Secondly no. Why dont you? your the one making yourself look stupid here, not me. If you dont have anything good to say then dont say it at all… Then you might not get a yellow dot instead of a green eh.
